AppSettings.MeetingHourLimitExceptionMessage: A meeting cannot exceed 2 hours or be less than 30 minutes
AppSettings.InvalidStartTimeExceptionMessage: Start date is in the past or is before end date
AppSettings.OutOfRangeExceptionMessage: Meeting time is outside range of 9am-5pm today
AppSettings.BadDateStringFormatExceptionMessage: Bad DateString format. Use format ISO 8601. Example: '2021-07-05T09:00:00Z'
